name: arbor-education/php-coding-standard
description: PHP coding standard ruleset for Arbor Education repositories

scripts.diff-files: f() { git diff --name-only --diff-filter=ACMRTUXB $1 | grep -i \.php$ | grep -vi resources/ ; }; f
scripts.cs: f() { if test "$1" ; then vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix --dry-run --config=.php_cs -v --using-cache=no --diff --diff-format=udiff --ansi $1 ; else echo "Nothing to fix" ; fi ; }; f
scripts.cs-fix: f() { if test "$1" ; then vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix --config=.php_cs -v --using-cache=no --diff --diff-format=udiff --ansi $1 ;  else echo "Nothing to fix" ; fi ; }; f
